sources.full: Virgil's Guide to the Lower Planes

resist.special: bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Command Undead (3/day)
entries: All undead within a 60ft radius must make an Intelligence saving throw {@dc 12} or be under the dullahan's control for 1 hour. Undead with an Intelligence score below 8 automatically fail this save.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the dullahan moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the dullahan can make another attack with its horse's hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Spine Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Call of the Grave
entries: One creature within 30ft. of the dullahan must make a Wisdom saving throw {@dc 12}. On a failure, that creature must make a death saving throw which remains until the next time the target recovers from falling {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.
